Interface KadConfiguration

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultConfiguration
public interface KadConfiguration
Interface that defines a KadConfiguration object

  • Method Details

    • restoreInterval

      long restoreInterval()
      Returns:
      Interval in milliseconds between execution of RestoreOperations.

    • responseTimeout

      long responseTimeout()
      If no reply received from a node in this period (in milliseconds) consider the node unresponsive.
      Returns:
      The time it takes to consider a node unresponsive

    • operationTimeout

      long operationTimeout()
      Returns:
      Maximum number of milliseconds for performing an operation.

    • maxConcurrentMessagesTransiting

      int maxConcurrentMessagesTransiting()
      Returns:
      Maximum number of concurrent messages in transit.

    • k

      int k()
      Returns:
      K-Value used throughout Kademlia

    • replacementCacheSize

      int replacementCacheSize()
      Returns:
      Size of replacement cache.

    • stale

      int stale()
      Returns:
      # of times a node can be marked as stale before it is actually removed.

    • getNodeDataFolder

      java.lang.String getNodeDataFolder​(java.lang.String ownerId)
      Creates the folder in which this node data is to be stored.
      Parameters:
      ownerId -
      Returns:
      The folder path

    • isTesting

      boolean isTesting()
      Returns:
      Whether we're in a testing or production system.
